isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: CYLINDER HEAD OR REPLACE GASKET; R & R AND/OR REPLACE
wtsproc.config: It is not necessary to open the A/C system. Air conditioning compressor may be repositioned to the air cleaner bracket and secured. For use with Engine Ser #2000001 and later.

step1.para: Install wheel chocks & open hood.
Disconnect battery to ground cable.
Remove bench seat assembly (if equipped).
Remove parking brake lever mount bolts and reposition (if equipped).
Remove shifter assembly.
Remove engine housing cover.
Remove engine splash shield from right side of engine compartment.
Remove front bumper assembly.
Drain radiator coolant.
Remove air cleaner housing with turbo inlet tube attached.
Remove both charge air cooler hoses and cap ends.
Disconnect engine accessory drive belt.
Remove alternator.
Disconnect both water heater hoses and secure out of the way.
Disconnect EGR cooler de-aeration hose and reposition.
Remove EGR cooler.
Disconnect turbocharger oil supply line from turbo.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbo.
Remove turbocharger assembly.
Remove air conditioning compressor assembly from mount bracket and secure out of way.
Disconnect CAM, ECT, EBP, and EGR actuator connectors and reposition wiring harnesses.
Disconnect coolant de-airation hose from a/c compressor mount bracket
Remove accessory drive belt idler pulley and EBP tube.
Remove air conditioning compressor mount bracket.
Disconnect air intake heater power supply from air intake manifold mixer (if equipped).
Remove air intake manifold mixer, EGR valve and crossover pipe assembly.
Disconnect EOT, MAP, MAT, ICP, IPR and fuel injector connectors and secure harnesses out of the way.
Disconnect fuel lines and remove fuel filter assembly.
Remove high pressure oil hose.
Remove fan shroud (engine mounted) upper support brace (if equipped).
Remove upper radiator hose and thermostat.
Remove both windshield wiper arms, radio antenna and cowl tray assembly.
Remove windshield wiper linkage and motor assembly.
Disconnect crankcase ventilation filter from valve cover and pipe from engine block.
Remove valve cover and gasket.
Remove fuel injector oil supply manifold.
Remove fuel injectors.
Loosen valves to prevent damage.
Remove rocker arm shaft assembly including rocker shaft supports, valve bridges and push rods.
Remove cylinder head bolts.
Disconnect hood stop cables and support hood with jack stand.
Install lifting device and chain to cylinder head.
Remove cylinder head.
Tap cylinder block head bolt holes as needed.
Clean cylinder block and head mating surfaces.
Check cylinder head mating surface for warpage and thickness.
Pressure test cylinder head for leaks.
Clean and check cylinder head bolt threads for re-use using special gauge
Position #1 cylinder to TDC on compression stroke.
Install cylinder head gasket.
Install cylinder head and torque bolts per engine service manual specifications.

note.para: Remove front engine lifting bracket to gain clearance for torque wrench swing.

step1.para: Install push rods.
Install rocker arm shaft assembly including rocker shaft supports & valve bridges. Torque to Spec.
Adjust valves per engine service manual specifications.
Replace fuel Injector O-rings and install injectors. Torque to spec.
Replace oil supply manifold o-rings and seals.
Install oil supply manifold. Torque to Spec.
Install valve cover and gasket includes connect all electrical connectors.

note.para: Do not install valve cover bolts at this time.

step1.para: Install crankcase ventilation filter to valve cover and pipe to engine block.
Connect engine sensor wiring connectors.
Install high pressure oil hose.
Install fuel filter assembly and connect fuel lines.
Install thermostat and upper radiator hose.
Install fan shroud (engine mounted) upper support brace (if equipped).
Install front engine lifting bracket.
Install air intake manifold mixer, EGR valve and crossover pipe assembly.
Connect air intake heater power supply to air intake manifold mixer.
Install turbocharger assembly and connect oil supply line.
Disconnect exhaust outlet pipe from turbo.
Install air conditioning compressor mount bracket.
Install engine accessory drive belt idler pulley and EBP tube.
Connect coolant de-aeration hose to A/C compressor mount bracket.
Connect CAM, ECT, EBP & EGR actuator connectors.
Install EGR cooler and connect de-aeration hose.
Connect both water heater hoses.
Fill radiator coolant.
Pressure test cooling system and check for leaks.
Install air conditioning compressor (if equipped).
Install alternator and connect wiring.
Connect engine accessory drive belt.
Install both charge air cooler hoses.
Install air cleaner housing with turbo inlet tube attached and connect IAT sensor.
Connect battery to ground cable.
Replace engine oil & filter.
Prime fuel system.
Start engine assembly to verify operation.

note.para: Must connect auto trans shifter to crank engine.

step1.para: Install valve cover bolts and torque to spec.
Secure engine wiring harnesses and install tie straps as necessary.
Install windshield wiper linkage and motor assembly.
Install cowl tray assembly, radio antenna and both windshield wiper arms.
Connect both hood stop cables.
Install engine splash shield to right side of engine compartment.
Install front bumper assembly.
Install engine housing cover.
Install shifter assembly.
Install parking brake lever mount bolts (if equipped).
Install bench seat assembly (if equipped).
Start engine assembly and check for leaks.
Remove wheel chocks and close hood.
